name: Ted Gunderson

topics.topic_text: Calm down. I've come to get you out of here.
There's no time to explain. We have to go now.
topics.response_text: All right, fine. I'm right behind you.

topics.topic_text: Some members of the White Glove Society. They were going to eat you.
topics.response_text: What in the sam hell? Eat me? What kind of sick bastards would eat a person?

topics.topic_text: The White Glove Society isn't to blame. Just Mortimer and a few others.
topics.response_text: To hell with that. You've seen those freaks. They dress the same, talk the same. You can bet they all eat the same, too.

topics.topic_text: You should have them all killed. It would serve them right.
topics.response_text: I never liked them White Shoes in the first place. We'd be doing the Strip a service.

topics.topic_text: You're right. Let's make sure they're all killed.
I could always leave you here if you aren't going to listen.
topics.response_text: All right, all right. But there's gonna be some justice one way or another. I'll see to that.

topics.topic_text: [Attack] Doesn't matter. I'm going to finish what they started.
Your dad's powerful. Someone wants him to feud with the White Glove Society.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] My daddy's got a lot of enemies. It don't make no sense that the White Pants Society would kidnap me. He's here to do business with them.

topics.topic_text: Er... probably just some mixed up people who are really sorry.
topics.response_text: [FAILED] Who gives a rat's patoot if they're sorry? Sorry's what they'll be when they're strung up and lynched by my daddy's posse.

conversation.response_text: Quit your hollering. I'm fine.{slightly annoyed by a doting parent}

description:
Ted Gunderson is a 20 year-old Caucasian Male.

Ted Gunderson is the ill-mannered and entitled son of notorious brahmin baron Heck Gunderson. He accompanies his father to the Ultra-Luxe casino, where he can often be found complaining about the accommodations and service.

Ted Gunderson's Personality: Ted is spoiled, arrogant, and disrespectful to those he considers beneath him. He has a neutral outlook on life, caring only for his own comfort and entertainment. Despite his upbringing, he lacks the work ethic expected of someone from his background.

Ted Gunderson's Backstory: Born to Heck Gunderson, one of the most successful brahmin barons in the Mojave, Ted has been pampered his entire life. He grew up on the Gunderson ranch but showed little interest in learning the family business, preferring instead to indulge in the finer things in life that his wealth could provide. His relationship with his father is strained, as Heck disapproves of Ted's laziness and sense of entitlement.
